text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1962. ==Events== *17 June - Brazil beat Czechoslovakia 3-1 to win the 1962 World Cup at Santiago, Chile. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Births== *25 July - Nelson Freitas, actor, producer & comedian ==Deaths== ==See also== *1962 in Brazil
title: 1962 in Brazilian television
